name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】AZKi対バン企画 LAST V STANDiNG vol.3 #LVS3【GUEST：MaiR】 [_qqd8XuHnUA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: AZKi performs 'Soracycle' during her 3D live concert.
MC section where AZKi thanks the audience and the band after performing 'Soracycle'.
AZKi introduces and starts performing the final song 'Dream Trip'.

subtitles.original: あふれているから
subtitles.english: Because it's overflowing

subtitles.original: Say Hello! 届け未来的 Show Time!
subtitles.english: Say Hello! Deliver a futuristic Show Time!

subtitles.original: 自信持ってもっと激しく遊べ
subtitles.english: Play more fiercely with confidence

subtitles.original: My sister
subtitles.english: My sister

subtitles.original: 今も The Dream!!
subtitles.english: Even now, The Dream!!

subtitles.original: 全部叶えていこう
subtitles.english: Let's make it all come true

subtitles.original: 夢見る力が地上を照らせば
subtitles.english: If the power of dreaming illuminates the earth

subtitles.original: 誰かの好きがつながって So Miracle
subtitles.english: Someone's 'love' connects and it's So Miracle

subtitles.original: またいつか花開くよ
subtitles.english: It will bloom again someday

subtitles.original: Soracycle! みんなできるよねー！
subtitles.english: Soracycle! Everyone can do it, right!

subtitles.original: Woah-woah-woah-woah...
subtitles.english: Woah-woah-woah-woah...

subtitles.original: もっと！
subtitles.english: More!

subtitles.original: Woah-woah-woah-woah...
subtitles.english: Woah-woah-woah-woah...

subtitles.original: OK!
subtitles.english: OK!

subtitles.original: ぼくら自分と世界の時差を混同しがちで
subtitles.english: We tend to confuse the time lag between ourselves and the world

subtitles.original: 世界が大人になってると勘違いして
subtitles.english: Mistakenly thinking the world is becoming an adult

subtitles.original: あるときループから放り出されて
subtitles.english: One day, being thrown out of the loop

subtitles.original: 変わり映えしない日々に戸惑う
subtitles.english: Bewildered by the unchanging days

subtitles.original: 誰かの夢が連鎖してゆくのは
subtitles.english: The chain reaction of someone's dream

subtitles.original: 自由を縛る鎖じゃなくて
subtitles.english: Is not a chain that binds freedom

subtitles.original: 少しずつでもまだ見ぬ世界
subtitles.english: Even if little by little, a world not yet seen

subtitles.original: 見えたらいいよね
subtitles.english: It would be nice if we could see it

subtitles.original: Say Hello! 響け宇宙的 Big Wave!
subtitles.english: Say Hello! Resonate with a cosmic Big Wave!

subtitles.original: 瞳輝かせた君が好きさ
subtitles.english: I like you with your eyes sparkling

subtitles.original: My sister
subtitles.english: My sister

subtitles.original: 今も The Dream!!
subtitles.english: Even now, The Dream!!

subtitles.original: いつも全身全霊
subtitles.english: Always with all my heart and soul

subtitles.original: 磁力線の向こう側目指して
subtitles.english: Aiming for the other side of the magnetic field lines

subtitles.original: 一瞬の閃光が永遠になって Spark
subtitles.english: A momentary flash becomes eternity and Spark

subtitles.original: この世界を変えてくよ
subtitles.english: Changing this world

subtitles.original: Soracycle
subtitles.english: Soracycle

subtitles.original: みんな今日は LVS3 来てくれてありがとねー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for coming to LVS3 today!

subtitles.original: うわー、コメントもハートもサイリウムもいっぱいありがとう！もっと盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Wow, thank you for all the comments, hearts, and psylliums! Let's get even more excited!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: 懐かしいことが心地いいとき
subtitles.english: When nostalgic things feel comfortable

subtitles.original: 新しいことは辛いこと
subtitles.english: New things are painful things

subtitles.original: それでも新しい
subtitles.english: Still, something new

subtitles.original: 明日が見たい
subtitles.english: I want to see tomorrow

subtitles.original: Say Hello! 届け未来的 Show Time!
subtitles.english: Say Hello! Deliver a futuristic Show Time!

subtitles.original: 自信持ってもっと激しく遊べ

subtitles.english: If the power of dreaming illuminates the earth

subtitles.original: 誰かの好きがつながって So Miracle
subtitles.english: Someone's 'love' connects and it's So Miracle

subtitles.original: またいつか花開くよ Soracycle
subtitles.english: It will bloom again someday, Soracycle

subtitles.original: 僕らの今が君を動かして
subtitles.english: Our present moves you

subtitles.original: またいつか花開くよ Soracycle
subtitles.english: It will bloom again someday, Soracycle

subtitles.original: Woah-woah-woah-woah...
subtitles.english: Woah-woah-woah-woah...

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: Woah-woah-woah-woah...
subtitles.english: Woah-woah-woah-woah...

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: AZKi、最後は
subtitles.english: AZKi, for the last song...

subtitles.original: MaiRちゃんの曲を歌わせてもらいます！
subtitles.english: I'll sing MaiR-chan's song!

subtitles.original: みんな聞いてね、ドリームトリップ！
subtitles.english: Everyone listen, Dream Trip!

subtitles.original: 頑張ってたって落ち込んだ日もあるでしょ
subtitles.english: Even if you were working hard, there must be days when you felt down

subtitles.original: ほら探してみよう 欠片集めて
subtitles.english: Look, let's go find them, gathering the pieces

subtitles.original: いつだって今だって みんながくれた言葉
subtitles.english: Always, even now, the words everyone gave me

subtitles.original: 意地っ張りな僕を変えてくれた
subtitles.english: Changed the stubborn me

subtitles.original: 部屋の隅で抱えてた
subtitles.english: Held in the corner of the room

subtitles.original: 伝えたい歌届けて
subtitles.english: Deliver the song I want to convey

subtitles.original: のように空に浮かぶあの願いは
subtitles.english: Like those wishes floating in the sky

subtitles.original: 世界動かす秘めた力
subtitles.english: The hidden power that moves the world

subtitles.original: ありがとう 走り出した
subtitles.english: Thank you, started running
